pages.text: $(li)Lionfish are hostile aquatic creatures that can be found near corals in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/warm_ocean)Warm Oceans$(/l).$(br)$(li)If you are near them, they will inflict Nausea and $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/poison)Poison$(/l) effects to you.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/upgrade_aquatic/raw_lionfish)Raw Lionfish$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bone_meal)Bone Meal$(/l) upon death.
They can be captured in a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/water_bucket)Water Bucket$(/l), which can be used as a trap in a $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/dispenser)Dispenser$(/l).
